snippet: For the first time, skippers in the around the world race are using hydrofoils, which can lift nearly out of the water and reach speeds of more than 30 miles per hour....
lead_paragraph: For the first time, skippers in the around the world race are using hydrofoils, which can lift nearly out of the water and reach speeds of more than 30 miles per hour.

headline.main: New Designs in Vendée Globe Offer More Speed, and Danger
